question.body: Which of the following is not properly matched?

multiple_choice.choice: Glucagon stimulates the conversion of glucose to fatty acids.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Thyroxine will increase glucose oxidation, which is the breakdown of glucose.
Correct. Glucagon stimulates the breakdown of fatty acids to raise the glucose level of the blood.
Incorrect. Insulin will stimulate the formation of glycogen to lower blood glucose levels.
Incorrect. Triiodothyronin increases body head production as part of its calorigenic effect.
